mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, mb_user_id AS mbUserId, mb_pw AS mbPw, mb_name AS mbName, mb_cellphone AS mbCellphone, mb_email AS mbEmail, mb_birth AS mbBirth, active AS active, reg_date AS regDate, update_date AS updateDate FROM board_ex.tb_member
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_ex.tb_member ( mb_user_id, mb_pw, mb_name, mb_cellphone, mb_email, mb_birth, reg_date ) VALUE ( #{mbUserId}, #{mbPw}, #{mbName}, #{mbCellphone}, #{mbEmail}, #{mbBirth}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE board_ex.tb_member SET mb_pw = #{mbPw}, mb_name = #{mbName}, mb_cellphone = #{mbCellphone}, mb_email = #{mbEmail}, mb_birth = #{mbBirth}, active = #{active}, update_date = now() WHERE mb_id = #{mbId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totCnt FROM board_ex.tb_member
